translation.en: [announcer] And it's Rockin' With Dewey continuing to race in second.
translation.es: Rockeando con Dewey sigue en carrera en segundo lugar.

translation.en: Then comes Masherhal, Hand Over Bell and Perfect Alliance
translation.es: NETFLIX PRESENTA ...Mano en la Campana y Alianza Perfecta...

translation.en: is still at the back of the field in 56 and 3/5 seconds.
translation.es: UNA PELÍCULA ORIGINAL DE NETFLIX ...en última posición, a 56 segundos y tres quintos.

translation.en: And now MF Happenstance leads the charge around the far turn.
translation.es: Y ahora lidera MF Casualidad en la última curva.

translation.en: MF Happenstance, three quarters of a length.
translation.es: MF Casualidad va ganando por tres cuartos de cuerpo.

translation.en: Mystery Woman second on the outside,
Rockin' With Dewey is third to the inside.
translation.es: Rockeando con Dewey, tercero por el medio.

translation.en: And they're being followed by Hand Over Bell, Masherhal,
translation.es: Los siguen Mano en la Campana, Masherhal

translation.en: and Perfect Alliance is still at the back.
translation.es: y Alianza Perfecta, que sigue último.

translation.en: And they're into the stretch, three quarters in 1:24.2.
translation.es: Están en el último tramo, tres cuartos en 1:24.2.

translation.en: And it is still MF Happenstance,
and here comes Mystery Woman to the outside.
translation.es: pero ahí viene por afuera Mujer Misteriosa.

translation.en: -And in the center, Hand Over Bell... -No.
translation.es: - Por el medio, Mano en la Campana... - No.

translation.en: Come on.
[announcer] It is Mystery Woman, Hand Over Bell on the far outside.
translation.es: Mujer Misteriosa primera, Mano en la Campana se acerca por fuera.

translation.en: -Masherhal is closing late... -[man] Come on, Mashy.
translation.es: - Masherhal viene con retraso... - Vamos, Mashy.

translation.en: [announcer] Here at the finish it's Hand Over Bell!
translation.es: ¡El primero en la meta es Mano en la Campana!

translation.en: -[man 2] Yeah, I got it. -Masherhal was next,
then came Rockin' With Dewey
and Mystery Woman in 1:51.4.
I'm starting.
No, we wait for him.
Hello?
[computer] You have a collect call from the Atlantic County Correctional Facility
translation.es: Tiene una llamada por cobrar desde la cárcel del condado de Atlantic

translation.en: -from... -[recorded voice] Darren.
[computer] Press one to accept.
-Darren. -Hey.
-Where are you? -Jail.
Jesus. What did you do?
No, it's nothing. I've been trying to call you.
You didn't pay your fuckin' cell phone?
Yeah, I get paid on Monday. What happened?
-I'm down in Atlantic City. -Ma.
translation.es: - Estoy preso en Atlantic City. - Mamá.

translation.en: Just some asshole, I ended up having to smash in his window.
translation.es: Tuve que romperle la ventana a un imbécil.

translation.en: Misdemeanor. Point is, I'm stuck here. I gotta spend the night.
translation.es: Es una contravención, pero debo pasar la noche encerrado.

translation.en: Which is why I need you to help me out. I got this thing going on here tomorrow...
translation.es: Por eso necesito tu ayuda. Debo hacer algo mañana.

translation.en: so you gotta do it and pretend you're me.
translation.es: Debes ir y fingir que eres yo.

translation.en: You'll get in a guy's car and deliver a briefcase.
translation.es: Debes entrar al auto de alguien y dejarle un maletín.

translation.en: [Darren] Don't worry about anything.
There's $1,500 in it for me. You know I need it.
All right? I'll be very proud of you.
translation.es: ¿Lo harás? Me sentiré muy orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: -What's in the suitcase? -It's a briefcase.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay en la maleta? - Es un maletín.

translation.en: What's in the briefcase?
I don't know.
No, I'm not doing-- You don't know?
It's just papers, man.
It's nothing major.
I'm not doing that.
-Put Ma on the phone. -No.
Danny!
-Put Ma on the phone. -[Ola speaking in Polish]
-[banging on door] -[conductor] Miss, I already told you,
translation.es: Señorita, ya se lo dije, si no tiene boleto,

translation.en: if you don't have a ticket you'll have to get off the train.
translation.es: Señorita, ya se lo dije, si no tiene boleto, debe bajar del tren.

translation.en: Daniel...
Your brother needs you. You're doing it.
translation.es: Tu hermano te necesita. Debes hacerlo.

translation.en: [Darren] Okay, look, just listen, all right?
There'll be a woman on a bench with a green purse.
translation.es: Habrá una mujer en un banco con una cartera verde.

translation.en: And you swap your briefcase for hers.
translation.es: Vas a intercambiar el maletín por su cartera.

translation.en: -[Danny] Green purse. -You're not writing this down, are you?
No.
Good. Don't be stupid, I really need this money.
translation.es: Bien. No seas idiota. Necesito el dinero.

translation.en: I owe you one, all right?
I'll pay your cell phone bill.
translation.es: Te pagaré la factura de teléfono.

translation.en: All right? She's got a green pocketbook and--
translation.es: Recuerda, ella tiene una cartera verde y...

translation.en: All right, but whose-- whose car am I getting into?
translation.es: Está bien, pero ¿de quién es el auto?

translation.en: -What? -Wrap it up.
Just one sec. You just got to do this for me, okay?
translation.es: Un segundo. Hazlo por mí, por favor.

translation.en: I'm gonna do it. Who's the guy driving the car?
translation.es: Lo haré, pero ¿quién maneja el auto?

translation.en: Promise me you'll do this. Danny? Promise me you'll do--
I'm doing it, but who's the guy driving the car?
translation.es: Lo haré, pero ¿quién es el tipo del auto?

translation.en: You got a swipe? You got a swipe?
[man] There's this one guy, like, from Philly, I think.
translation.es: Uno de los tipos creo que es de Filadelfia.

translation.en: They got like a Philly vibe, and, uh...
Russell and Jimmy know him.
Russell's been a big pain in the ass, but Jimmy gets it, you know?
translation.es: A Russell no le gusta mucho, pero Jimmy lo entiende.

translation.en: Like, he knows I can come through for him.
translation.es: Sabe que puedo conseguirle lo que necesita.

translation.en: Shit's been weird since the bust, but this is a good situation
translation.es: Está extraño desde el arresto, pero esta es una buena oportunidad.

translation.en: 'cause these guys, they're professional.
Not like Howie, that fuck. That guy doesn't know what he's doing.
translation.es: No como el idiota de Howie. No sabe lo que hace.

translation.en: And the plan is intricate, you know what I mean?
It's like a clock, you know.
Everything fits together and everyone gets protected.
translation.es: Todo encaja y están todos protegidos.

translation.en: I want more money.
-No. -I'm driving.
I'm keeping the clock running.
What are you talking about? You came to me for work.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? Tú me pediste trabajo.

translation.en: I mean, how'd you lose that job anyway?
Creative differences.
[chuckles] Really?
And how's, uh, Ricky's check cashing con paying off for you?
translation.es: ¿La estafa de los cheques con Ricky no está dando sus frutos?

translation.en: Because no one asked you to skip town to Pittsburgh
translation.es: Nadie te pidió que te fueras a Pittsburgh

translation.en: for some greaseball shithead.
Yeah, well, he did.
I mean, if you don't go back to Pittsburgh,
translation.es: Si no te fueras a Pittsburgh,

translation.en: I have a... queen size bed.
translation.es: podrías dormir en mi cama, es grande.

translation.en: You've done worse.
Well, I'm going back to Pittsburgh, so I'm fine on the couch, Scott.
translation.es: Volveré a Pittsburgh, Scott, así que me conformo con el sofá.

translation.en: Just do the job.
This is the phone. Don't make any outgoing calls.
translation.es: Aquí está el teléfono. No hagas llamadas.

translation.en: And these are the keys to the Sentra.
translation.es: Y estas son las llaves del Sentra.

translation.en: -Thought you said it was an Altima. -It's a fuckin' Nissan. Doesn't matter.
translation.es: - ¿No dijiste que era un Altima? - Es un maldito Nissan. No importa.

translation.en: It's, like, uh, gonna be the only red Nissan on the block.
translation.es: Será el único Nissan rojo de la cuadra.

translation.en: -What's in the briefcase? -I don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay en el maletín? - No lo sé.

translation.en: You can't know everything, Ellie.
Sometimes you gotta just do it.
translation.es: A veces solo hay que hacerlo.

translation.en: Here you go.
Felicia, I can go?
Are you the guy?
Uh... yeah.
Yeah.
You the guy?
Yeah, I'm the girl.
Right.
I can see that.
Get in.
Do you know what the-- the-- the guy looks like?
No.
It is a guy, right?
Keep the car on.
Roll this back window down.
-[man shouting in distance] -He's coming back, he's coming back.
-Do you think they got the license plate? -I don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Habrán visto la matrícula? - No lo sé.

translation.en: Because, man...
Do you know who the girl is I gotta meet with the green bag?
translation.es: ¿Sabes quién es la chica con la cartera verde?

translation.en: -Good luck. -All right.
Come on, man.
Yeah, it's done.
Oh, my God-- Oh, my God, it's you.
You don't even know what I just did.
translation.es: No sabes lo que me pasó.

translation.en: Look, stop. Where are you goin'?
Look-- Don't run, don't run, don't run, please don't run.
I just need a number or something, I just need...
translation.es: Necesito un número o algo así.

translation.en: I don't know, an address or something, like...
You're not gonna help me?
I just gave the briefcase to the wrong woman.
translation.es: Le di el maletín a otra mujer.

translation.en: Exactly. What are we gonna do?
What am I gonna do? I'm not supposed to be here.
translation.es: ¿Qué voy a hacer? No debería estar aquí.

translation.en: I'm not even supposed to be here, it's my brother.
translation.es: No debería estar aquí, sino mi hermano.

translation.en: -Do you know my brother Darren? -Don't fucking tell me his name.
translation.es: - ¿Conoces a mi hermano Darren? - ¡No me digas su nombre!

translation.en: Why don't you wanna know?
Look, look! Look, you're not gonna get your 1,500 either, okay?
-1,500? -Yeah, 1,500. That's all I know.
translation.es: - ¿$1500? - Sí, me dijo eso nada más.

translation.en: -All I know is the green-- -They're paying you fuckin' $1,500?
translation.es: - Solo sé que tenía una cartera... - ¿Te pagarán $1500?

translation.en: I think so. I don't even know.
Give me your phone. Give me your fucking phone.
I don't have a-- I didn't pay my bill.
What are we gonna do?
You got a quarter?
I got a phone card. You gonna call him?
You're calling him?
-Fuck. -This is not fucking rocket science.
How hard is it? You walk up to the fucking platform,
-you exchange the suitcase. -I know.
I got an eight-year-old that can do it.
You give it to this fuckin' Pollack, look what happens.
translation.es: Mira lo que hizo el maldito polaco.

translation.en: -You're so fucking stupid-- -Stop talking, Russell!
-Stop talking! -[cell phone ringing]
Hold up. Who's this?
-Well, hello there. -[man] I think we got a problem.
translation.es: - Ah, hola. - Me parece que tenemos un problema.

translation.en: Yeah, no shit. $1,500, Scott?
Why is some idiot getting twice as much as me?
translation.es: ¿Por qué este idiota recibe el doble que yo?

translation.en: -[Scott] He with you now? -Yes.
Do you have the thing?
No.
But I have the address where it's going.
translation.es: Pero tengo la dirección adonde se dirige.

translation.en: I think we got it under control, okay? Just gonna take a little longer.
translation.es: Todo está bajo control, solo nos llevará más de tiempo.

translation.en: It's fine. We got it under control.
It's gonna cost you.
[Scott] Okay. The full $1,500.
Twice that.
What the fuck do I care? It's comin' out of your share.
translation.es: ¿Qué mierda me importa? Es tu parte.

translation.en: -Okay. -We need to see Darren, too.
translation.es: - Está bien. - Queremos ver a Darren.

translation.en: And she brings Darren. I don't want him running around until this is done.
translation.es: Sí, que traiga a Darren. No quiero que se entrometa.

translation.en: Okay, so you deliver the thing and you bring him with you tonight.
translation.es: Entrega eso y tráelo cuando vengas a la noche.

translation.en: You can keep his share, too.
Okay. All right.
New Ebony Hotel, Room 1310, 10:00 p.m.
1310, got it. Let's go.
Wait, wait, you don't need me. You-- You got the address.
translation.es: Espera, no me necesitas. Ya tienes la dirección.

translation.en: Take the bag, I don't want it anymore.
translation.es: Toma la cartera, no la quiero.

translation.en: What does the woman look like?
She's got blonde hair, she had a white shirt on.
translation.es: Es rubia y usaba una camiseta blanca.

translation.en: -She's... -Yeah, exactly. Let's go.
[Ellie] What's the address on the pills again?
-[pills rattling] -31 Maryasis Road.
It's in Briarcliff.
[Ellie] Hi, what train goes to Briarcliff?
Ossining or Scarborough, whichever one is closer to you.
translation.es: Ossining o Scarborough. El que le quede más cerca.

translation.en: -Scarborough. -12:20, track 40.
translation.es: - Scarborough. - A las 12:20 en el andén 40.

translation.en: Okay. Thank you.
You want to guess what my name is?
My name is Danny.
-Come on, tell me your name. -[scoffs] I'm not telling you my name.
translation.es: - Vamos, dime tu nombre. - No te diré cómo me llamo.

translation.en: All right. Where are you from?
Look, you fucked up, so you lost "knowing shit" privileges, all right?
translation.es: Mira, arruinaste todo, perdiste el privilegio de saber mis datos.

translation.en: -You know, you can be a real-- -A what? Huh?
-A real bitch? -What?
No, no.
I was-- I was gonna say you can be a tough nut to crack, but...
translation.es: Iba a decir que eres cabeza dura.

translation.en: Were you really gonna say "a tough nut to crack"?
translation.es: ¿En serio ibas a decir que soy cabeza dura?

translation.en: Yeah. Why, what's wrong with that?
I live in Pittsburgh.
How's Pittsburgh?
A lot of shitty people.
Oh. I'm sorry.
Don't be sorry. You didn't build it.
translation.es: No lo sientas, no lo diseñaste.

translation.en: So, you live with anyone in Pittsburgh?
You know, you got a roommate or, you know, you got a boyfriend?
I live with a Ricky.
What's a Ricky?
I had a lizard named Ricky once.
translation.es: Tuve un lagarto que se llamaba Ricky.

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds about right.
Come on, you'll be done when it's done.
Who do you think lives out here?
Rich people.
So, how much do you think these houses cost?
-Why? You in the market? -Oh, no.
What about, uh, Sacramento? You ever been there?
No, thank God.
There's a job opening there.
translation.es: Hay una vacante de trabajo allí.

translation.en: 'Cause I'm a chef, you know?
At a nice restaurant in the city.
translation.es: Trabajo en un buen restorán de la ciudad.

translation.en: You know what "farm to table" is, right?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que significa de la granja a la mesa?

translation.en: I'm more of a cook, I guess.
Okay, sure, whatever, but you don't have to leave New York.
translation.es: No es necesario que te vayas de Nueva York.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but...
my living situation's not great.
Fine, but there's restaurants everywhere.
translation.es: Pero en todos lados hay buenos restoranes.

translation.en: That's true.
So what about you? What do you do?
-I'm recently unemployed. -Oh, really?
translation.es: - Me quedé sin trabajo hace poco. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: What did you do?
I-- I was a bartender.
But I made-- I made, like, fancy cocktails.
That's cool. I got this friend Lev that I went to high school with,
translation.es: Genial. Mi excompañero de escuela, Lev,

translation.en: he-- he's a bar-back in the city at this bar and he's just like...
translation.es: es ayudante de camarero en un bar.

translation.en: His favorite drink to make is, like, these egg whites--
translation.es: Su trago favorito es con claras de huevo...

translation.en: Look, I wasn't a bartender, okay? I worked in a strip club.
translation.es: No era camarera. Trabajaba en un club nocturno.

translation.en: All right. Okay.
I bet you were successful at that, you know.
-What the fuck's that supposed to mean? -Nothing, just 'cause--
You're pretty and you're smart, and...
Well, I wasn't.
And I was only a waitress, okay? I didn't strip or work the back.
translation.es: Yo solo era moza. No me desnudaba ni cobraba por sexo.

translation.en: -All right. -I'm serious. I don't sleep around.
translation.es: - Bueno. - De verdad. No me acuesto por dinero.

translation.en: -What, you don't believe me? -I believe you.
-Guess how many guys I've slept with. -It doesn't matter--
translation.es: - Adivina con cuántos tipos me acosté. - No me importa...

translation.en: -No, no. Guess. -I'm not guessing, that's stupid.
translation.es: - No. Adivina. - No, es una tontería.

translation.en: -I'm not gonna guess. -Seven.
-Okay. -It's not a lot.
It's not a lot. I probably would've said higher.
translation.es: No es mucho. Habría dicho más.

translation.en: Oh, so you're saying I look like a whore now?
No! I just...
I just-- I wouldn't even think you were a whore
translation.es: No habría dicho que eras una prostituta

translation.en: if you slept with, like, a hundred guys.
translation.es: aunque te hubieras acostado con cien.

translation.en: Yeah, exactly.
-Who are you to judge me? -I'm not judging you.
translation.es: - ¿Quién eres para juzgarme? - No te juzgo.

translation.en: That's why I don't wanna guess.
We're lost.
-Uh, we shouldn't be. -No, I've seen that house before.
translation.es: - No puede ser. - Ya vi esa casa antes.

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe you were here when you were a kid.
You know, if that was the right left, then this is Maryasis.
translation.es: Si doblamos bien, esto tiene que ser Maryasis.

translation.en: If they put up a fuckin' street sign we'd be able to tell.
translation.es: Si hubiera algún maldito cartel, lo sabríamos.

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing? -Looking for an address.
No, no, you can't do this, it's a federal crime.
translation.es: No puedes hacer eso. Es delito.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I got an accomplice.
Look, it is the right street.
Put it away.
Can I help you?
-Hey. Um, do you live here? -I do not.
-Neither do we. -No.
You don't look much like the Kutikoffs.
translation.es: No se parecen a los Kutikoff.

translation.en: The Kutiko-- Yeah, uh-- We're supposed to just, you know...
translation.es: Los Kutikoff... Sí, en realidad debíamos...

translation.en: -They're-- We're just... -We're just a little lost.
-We're just a little lost. -That's it.
You know what I do when I'm lost?
translation.es: ¿Saben lo que hago cuando me pierdo?

translation.en: I call the police. Shall I call them for you?
translation.es: Llamo a la Policía. ¿Quieren que llame?

translation.en: -No, no. -No, thanks. We're just gonna leave.
translation.es: - No, no. - No, gracias. Ya nos íbamos.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[man] Good idea.
Sorry.
Don't worry about it. He's driving a fucking SUV.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Conduce una camioneta familiar.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -He's an asshole.
I don't think anyone's home.
Hey. It's in the living room. Don't let the dog out.
translation.es: Hola. Está en la sala. No dejen salir al perro.

translation.en: -Is that the girl that took the bag? -No, no. This girl is younger.
translation.es: - ¿Es la chica que tomó el bolso? - No, esta es más joven.

translation.en: Uh, I guess.
I don't think she's talking about the briefcase.
I think we just have to find her and ask her.
Yeah. Yeah, let's do that.
Hello?
Hello?
Hey, look, it's a Ricky.
Oh, my God, check it out.
That's a big lizard.
I don't know why they give kids pets that die so young.
translation.es: ¿Para qué les dan a los niños animales que se mueren tan rápido?

translation.en: Maybe let 'em be sad about something small before the really sad things happen.
translation.es: Para que se entristezcan por algo pequeño antes de que suceda lo malo de verdad.

translation.en: Come on.
And, you know, lizards have a really long lifespan.
translation.es: Además, los lagartos viven mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Like, 20 years.
So what happened to Ricky?
Uh, well, his living situation wasn't exactly ideal either.
translation.es: Él también tenía problemas de vivienda.

translation.en: -Ya know. -Whose is?
These guys'.
-Yeah. -[Danny] Hello.
Hello?
[Ellie] Hello?
-Where is she? -Yeah, and where's the dog?
Hey, look, someone's coming home.
I think that-- That's the guy with the SUV.
translation.es: Es del tipo de la camioneta.

translation.en: What?
Hide. Hide.
What are you doing? Come on.
-[whispers] We gotta jump. -What?
[whispers] We gotta jump.
[softly] We got this, okay?
Fuck.
[mouthing] Come on. Jump!
Come on.
We didn't let the dog out.
translation.es: No dejamos que se escape el perro.

translation.en: You know what? Look, I'm going back up there.
I'm going back up there.
I'm going to explain to them. Take my ID.
translation.es: Les explicaré todo. Te dejo mi identificación.

translation.en: If I get arrested I'm gonna give a false name.
translation.es: Si me arrestan, daré un nombre falso.

translation.en: The name isn't the problem, you've been seen by half the family.
translation.es: El nombre no es el problema. Te vio casi toda la familia.

translation.en: Let's just wait till they go in the morning.
translation.es: Al la mañana se irán y podremos entrar.

translation.en: The wife will probably leave the briefcase inside, we'll go in and get it.
translation.es: Seguro la mujer dejó el maletín adentro.

translation.en: -And what if it's not there? -Then we'll leave, all right?
We just got to wait and see.
translation.es: Pero hay que esperar y fijarse.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, all right? I screwed up.
It's my fault. I'm gonna forfeit my share, okay?
translation.es: Es mi culpa. Renunciaré a mi parte.

translation.en: -But I can't stay here the whole night. -No, you have to.
translation.es: - Pero no puedo quedarme toda la noche. - Tienes que quedarte.

translation.en: Why? Why? And honestly, you should come with me.
We should let them deal with this.
This is-- This is their problem. This has nothing to do with us.
translation.es: Es su problema, nosotros no tenemos nada que ver.

translation.en: Unless you know how someone who's broke can make enough money
translation.es: A menos que sepas cómo ganar mucho dinero

translation.en: to get out of a shitty situation, then it's worth it to me.
translation.es: para salir de un aprieto, yo debo quedarme.

translation.en: Are you using the money to get away from that guy?
translation.es: ¿Necesitas el dinero para escaparte de ese tipo?

translation.en: Yes, okay?
I'm using the money to leave Pittsburgh.
translation.es: Necesito el dinero para irme de Pittsburgh.

translation.en: Okay.
Hey, uh...
good job back there.
You know, from not letting the dog out and stuff.
translation.es: No dejaste salir el perro ni nada.

translation.en: -You gonna order something? -Yeah, sure.
Um, what can we get for nine dollars?
Is that including tip?
Sure.
Can I use your phone?
-You have reached the voice mailbox of... -Scott.
translation.es: - Se comunicó con la casilla de... - Scott.

translation.en: -Please leave a message after the tone. -[beep]
translation.es: Por favor, deje un mensaje después del tono.

translation.en: Hey, it's me.
We're fine, we're on it but we got delayed.
translation.es: Nos estamos ocupando, pero nos retrasamos.

translation.en: So it won't be going down till tomorrow.
So, yeah, we'll be at the motel in the morning.
translation.es: Nos encontramos en el hotel por la mañana.

translation.en: -[Danny] So what'd he say? -Couldn't reach him.
All right, look, let's get some food.
You need food? I need food, I'm starving.
-Yeah? -All right, yeah.
Kids' menu or appetizers?
[Ellie] So what about you? You got a roommate, girlfriend?
[Danny] Well, I was-- I was seeing this girl in my building last year.
translation.es: Salí con una chica de mi edificio el año pasado.

translation.en: [Ellie] Oh, really? With that little hair thing above your lip?
translation.es: ¿En serio? ¿Con esa cosa rara sobre tu labio?

translation.en: What's wrong with my mustache?
All right, who else?
[Danny] I don't wanna talk about this with you. [Ellie] Come on, give me something.
translation.es: - No quiero contarte. - Vamos, dime algo.

translation.en: Very bad for Darren?
Ma, it could be very bad for me.
translation.es: Mamá, yo me meteré en problemas.

translation.en: [Ellie] What about high school?
Some scandalous hallway hookups? Some stairway action?
translation.es: ¿Te besuqueaste en el pasillo? ¿Estuviste con alguna en las escaleras?

translation.en: All right.
Rebecca Vargas. She touched my penis in tenth grade.
translation.es: Rebecca Vargas. Me tocó el pene en décimo grado.

translation.en: -Wow. Rebecca Vargas? -Yeah, Rebecca Vargas.
Rebecca Vargas back then... Oh, my God, man.
translation.es: Y en esa época, no sabes lo que era Rebecca Vargas.

translation.en: Ohh. I don't know if it counts, though.
-[Ellie] Why wouldn't it count? -Well...
All right. Mike Budabin, a friend of mine,
he told everyone that whoever got Rebecca Vargas
translation.es: les dijo a todos que el primero que lograra

translation.en: to touch their penis first, wins the "Special Prize."
translation.es: que Rebecca Vargas le tocara el pene, ganaría un premio especial.

translation.en: [Ellie] What was the Special Prize?
It was having Rebecca Vargas touch your penis.
translation.es: Que Rebecca Vargas te tocara el pene.

translation.en: -Makes sense. -Right.
Anyway, she found out about this prize being associated with her
translation.es: Ella se enteró del premio que la tenía como protagonista

translation.en: and she wanted to know what it was.
translation.es: y quiso saber de qué se trataba.

translation.en: And so she asked me, and I said that I would tell her, but...
she had to touch my penis first.
translation.es: pero primero debía tocarme el pene.

translation.en: So she tapped it with her pinky and...
translation.es: Le dio un golpecito con el meñique

translation.en: that's how I won the Special Prize.
translation.es: y así gané el premio especial.

translation.en: [Ola, in Polish] Daniel, just come home now.
You'll make supper, and the bettors are coming early tomorrow.

translation.en: We should just let Darren handle it.

translation.en: Yeah.
Daniel?
I'm gonna stay.
Daniel? Daniel? Hello?
Thank you.

translation.es: No sé si es la historia más tierna o más patética

translation.en: I've ever heard in my life.
No, no, no, it's the sweetest. It's the sweetest.
For the record, it counts.
-Really? -Yeah, of course.
I mean, she touched your penis, right?
[Danny] You don't think that we should just sleep in the woods?

-What if this is alarmed? -The pool shed?
translation.es: - ¿Y si tiene alarma? - ¿El cobertizo de la piscina?

translation.en: -I don't know. -Don't worry. It's not alarmed.

translation.en: Just come on. Live a little.
[Danny] So he ends up going to court
and he was in the courtroom going "It was a ghost."

So, what do you cook?
Everything.
-I mean, at the restaurant. -Oh. Um...
It's, uh, it's a nice little Italian place.
You ever been there? To Italy?
No. No.
I mean, the only place I've ever been is Providence.

Forget Sacramento.
Yeah.
I've been there once.
-[Danny] You have? -To Italy, yeah.
Wow. Did you go with your family or something?
No.
-I'm sorry, I didn't... -Don't be sorry.

Yeah, I guess.
Italy has a lot of shady people once you get past all the tourist stuff.

translation.en: Right.
You don't ever think that maybe it's-- it's not the place that's shady,

Excuse me?

You wanna cuddle me?

Meteorological.
That's what I meant.

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah?
We're only cuddling for warmth.
Yeah. Cuddling for weather purposes.

So, yeah. We'll be at the motel in the morning.

Move on.

All right?

Polish.

Ma.
